name: Yet Another Platformer But Small
description:
Run, Gun, and Platform your way out of the infected station!

This is a early concept that I am still working on. Everything is subject to change.

Instructions:

" W - A - S - D " or joystick to move and aim

" J ", Left mouse button or Right Trigger to shoot

" K ", Space bar or A Button to jump

D-pad for menu selection

Note:

This build only has one test level that can have up to 4 players locally

It may also lag as the game is not optimized yet.
